page.title: 18SHIELDAIG ANNUAL BOAT RACE
page.content: EVERY YEAR IN AUGUST, SHIELDAIG VILLAGE ASSOCIATION HOLD THEIR BOAT RACE AND STREET FETE. THIS IS USUALLY WELL ATTENDED EVEN THOUGH THE WEATHER UP HERE CAN BE INCLEMENT. LOCAL PEOPLE SET UP STALLS AND SIDE SHOWS TO ATTRACT CUSTOMERS WHO, HOPEFULLY, WILL SPEND THEIR MONEY AND RAISE FUNDS FOR THE ASSOCIATION. THE HIGHLIGHT OF THE DAY IS THE BOAT RACE AROUND THE ISLAND. THE BOATS HOLD TWO COMPETITORS WITH TWO OARS. THERE MAY BE FIERCE COMPETITION THIS YEAR DUE TO THE LARGE CASH PRIZE. SHIELDAIG VILLAGE ASSOCIATION USE THEIR FUNDS TO PUT ON EVENTS DURING THE LONG DARK WINTERS AND HAVE REFURBISHED A SWIMMING POOL FOR THE USE OF THE CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE.
